title: Ralph UI keyboard shortcuts not working (q, c, Ctrl+C)
description: The Ralph Ink UI shows 'q' quit and 'c' config as options, but pressing them does nothing. Ctrl+C also doesn't exit cleanly. Keyboard input handling is broken.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Investigate keyboard input handling in ralph-ui/src/
Fix 'c' to open config (or remove if not implemented)
Fix Ctrl+C to exit cleanly without orphan processes
Test all keyboard shortcuts work in terminal
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
